metadata.name: Misty Mountains #1/14
metadata.description:
A serene green landscape with misty mountains, tall trees, and a sense of depth and distance.

The flat illustration style gives it a dreamlike quality, as if recalling a distant memory of a past journey or adventure. The contrasting shades of green and the subtle details in the mountains and trees evoke a sense of calm and peacefulness, inviting viewers to reminisce about their own memories of nature's beauty and serenity.
